title: CloudOS
content: CloudOS is a simple web-based terminal made by clantum studios to provide a terminal like experience to people on the web! This terminal is made to replicate the look of a real terminal. its a combination of cmd and ubuntu's terminal, making it look very nice. go give it a try now!

title: GalaxyOS
content: GalaxyOS (formerly QuantumOS) is a functional WebOS powered by the PlutoOS core. This OS is made to replicate a desktop experience on the web that normal users would get as an actual os. Go try it out now!

title: Leonardo: The AI Voice Assistant
content: Leonardo is an AI voice assistant that can be connected to a Bluetooth or aux-enabled speaker and be made into a smart one. It is designed to be easy to use and can perform various tasks through voice commands. Stay tuned for more updates on this exciting project!
